XXn693u_006:33: na pūrvvasiddhaṃ nāpyadhunāsiddhaṃ tadeva mukhapratibimbaṃ sādṛśyamātramāpādayati tathāpi lokāḥ svamukhaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā bhrāntyā santuṣṭā bhavanti |
XXn693u_006:34: tathaivācāryyāḥ kumatadāḥ prajñājñānamāsādya sahajamanubhūtaṃ iti kṛtvā santoṣaṃ utpādayanti,
XXn693u_006:35: santuṣṭāśca santo dharmmamudrāyā vārttāmapi na jānanti |
XXn693u_006:36: dharmmamudrāmajānānā kevalayā karmmamudrayā kṛtrimayā kathamakṛtrimabhūtaṃ sahajākhyaṃ utpadyate |
XXn693u_006:37: sajātīyāt kāraṇāt sajātīyasya eva kāryyasya utpattirbhavati na tu vijātīyāt yathā śālībījāt śālyaṅkurotpattirbhavati natu kodravyasya |
XXn693u_006:38: tathā dharmmamudrāyā akṛtrimāyāḥ sakāśāt akṛtrimaṃ sahajaṃ utpadyate |
XXn693u_006:46: tat svacchamāsthānaṃ volakakkolarasasaṃyogena avadhṛtyā samvṛtibodhicittamaṇyantargataṃ yadā bhavet tadā kṣaṇikanāmā parasahajākhyaṃ jñānamutpadyate
XXn693u_006:48: tatsvarūpeṇa prajñājñānānandatrayaḥ kṣaṇacatuṣṭayānvitaṃ mekaṃ haṭhayoge ca karmmamudrāyā niṣpandaphalamuktam |
XXn693u_006:50: om-dharmmamudrā dharmmadhātusvarūpā niṣprapañcā nirvvikalpā akṛtrimā utpādarahitā karuṇāsvabhāvā paramā nandaikasundaropāyabhūtā |
XXn693u_006:51: pravāhanityatvena sahajasvabhāvā yā prajñāyāḥ sahajodayatvena abhinnā yā sā dharma mudretyabhidhīyate |
XXn693u_006:52: anyat lakṣaṇaṃ tasyāḥ saṅkulājñānāndhakāre taraṇikiraṇasadṛśaṃ gurūpadeśataḥ tṛṇatu[ṣa]samā tatrāpi bhrāntiśalyavarjjitaṃ bodhyavyam |
XXn693u_006:58: mārgajñāne sādaranirantaraṃ mārgābhyāsāt nirodhasya sahajasvabhāvasya sākṣātkṛtitvaṃ bhavati |
XXn693u_006:60: nāpaneyaṃ ataḥ kiñcit prakṣeptavyaṃ na kiñcana |
XXn693u_006:62: lalanā rasanā tayormadhyadeśe nivāsinī avadhūtī saivādhigatasakalapadārthasahajasvabhāvaikacittavṛtteḥ sadgurūpadeśato dharmmamudrā mahāmudrāyā abhedena hetubhūtā |
XXn693u_006:66: mahāmudrā niḥsvabhāvā jñeyādyāvaraṇavivarjjitā śaradamalamadhyāhnagaganasaṅkāśā sakalasampadādhārabhūtā bhavanirvvāṇaikasvarūpā anālambanakaruṇāśarīrā mahāsukhaikarūpā |
XXn693u_006:67: tathā ca,amanasikārā dharmmā kuśalā manasikārā dharmmā akuśalā pravacane ca |
XXn693u_006:73: hū-samayamudreti sambhoganirmmāṇakāyākārasvabhāvena svacchākāreṇa ca sattvārthāya vajradharasya herukākāreṇa visphuraṇaṃ yat sā samayamudreti copadiśyate |
XXn693u_006:74: tāṃ ca samayamudrāṃ gṛhītvā cakrākāreṇa pañcavidhaṃ jñānaṃ pañcavidhaṃ parikalpya ādarśa-samatā-pratyavekṣaṇā-kṛtyānuṣṭhāna-suviśuddha-dharmmadhātubhiḥ ādiyoga-maṇḍalarājāśri-karmmarājāśri-binduyoga-sūkṣmayogaiḥ samayamudrācakraṃ bhāvayantyācāryyāḥ |
XXn693u_006:78: tasmāt sahajasiddharasāt na bedhena sthiracalādayo yena vā bālaparikalpitā te saṃbodhikā[raṇa]tāmupayānti |
XXn693u_006:79: na mantrajāpo na tapo na homo
XXn693u_006:80: na māṇḍaleyaṃ na ca maṇḍalaṃ ca |
XXn693u_006:81: sa mantrajāpaḥ sa tapaḥ sa homaḥ
XXn693u_006:84: samāsataḥ sarvvadharmmāṇāmekākārato yadut mahāsukhākārataḥ cittamitibodhicittaṃ samājarūpīti |
XXn693u_007:9: prajñājñānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vai caturthaṃ tat punastathā ||
XXn693u_007:23: atra ca pañcābhiṣekaḥ pañcasu locanādividyāyāḥ vyāpārāt |
XXn693u_007:24: atra ca avidyāmalakṣālanāya akṣobhyarūpeṇa vajrācāryyeṇa vairocanarūpāvalambini śiṣye salilābhiṣeko deyaḥ |
XXn693u_007:32: yatra bhavasarodbha[va]mukhāt sphuranti pañcārarūpiṇo munayaḥ pañcaskandhaviśuddhyā niṣkrāntā bhavaśarīreṇa |
XXn693u_007:33: iha ca madhyārābhimukhata uparyadhareṇa sarvve rūpādayo vijñānātmakā iti sūcyante |
XXn693u_007:34: ete ca sarvve sarvvātmakā iti nive[da]yituṃ sarvvatraiva caturaśrī |
XXn693u_007:35: atha te dharmmasya buddhā hūnādaniveditātmarūpasya pañcāsivimuktakāyāḥ paryyante cānyatra visphuritā śūnyatānimittāḥ praṇihi(hi)
XXn693u_007:42: asya ca vajrābhiṣekasy avidhānaṃ utpaśyamānā bhedyajñānabījādhānamiva vidhātuṃ evaṃ vajraghaṇṭā'
XXn693u_007:43: pi pūrvvābhisandhānena dvādaśāṅguliparimāṇā adhomukhāmbhojavajrasamāpattiniḥ svabhāvena sarvvadharmmasvabhāvaṃ pratipādayituṃ abhedyajñānanigadatāṃ dharmmodayasya bodhayituṃ mūrddhādhobhāge ca vajrāvalīyugalamālinī |
XXn693u_007:44: tridhātukasvabhāvakūṭāgāratāmasya sthāpayituṃ hārārdhahāraprakāra ata eva pañcatathāgatāṅkitaḥ śūnyatākaruṇābhinnajñānakāraṇatāṃ āvedayitumapari[ṇata]prajñāmukhākhyānam
XXn693u_007:45: asya ca dharmma dhātusvarūpasya jñānasya vairocanādipañcatathāgatātmakatāṃ ca rūpādipañcaskandhasvabhāvatāṃ ca pṛthivyādipañcadhāturūpatāṃ ca kathayituṃ ūrddhaṃ pañcāraviracanā |
XXn693u_007:48: anuttarāśeṣadharmmabodhād vikārakaṃ iha prādhānyasyāpanāya hetukatāpratipādanāya ca kāraṇabhūtamapi vajraghaṇṭābhiṣekamullaṅghya prathamaṃ vajrābhiṣekadānam
XXn693u_007:49: sarvvadharmmā nāsatā iti pratipādanārthaṃ bhaviṣyanmunīndrapadocitanāmanidānāvadānārthaṃ ca pūrvva nāmavyapanayena svadevatākulagotrānusāreṇa nāmābhiṣekaḥ |
XXn693u_007:51: itaḥ prabhṛti asaṃskṛto bhedayuganaddhabāhibo[dhi]dharmmasamayastvaṃ iti bodhayituṃ vajrasamayaḥ,
XXn693u_007:54: maṇḍalatattvaṃ maṇḍalaviśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ devatātattvam devatāviśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ ācāryyaparikarmma ca maṇḍalasādhanajñānaṃ pañcapradīpaṃ cāmṛtabhakṣaṇaṃ ca bhavyatātattvaṃ ca naiḥsvābhāvyameṣāmutpannakramapakṣataḥ dharmmacakrapravarttanārthamanujñā |
XXn693u_007:56: tathā hi bhuvo dharādeḥ svaḥ svarūpaṃ bhūrbhūyā iti hi bhūrbhuvaḥ svarityasyārthaḥ |
XXn693u_007:68: prajñājñānameva prakṛtirūpaṃ vikārarūpaṃ prakṛtisamutpādātmakaṃ yuganaddhādvayavāhisuviśuddhasvabhāvaṃ caturthārthamityapare |
XXn693u_008:4: om āḥ hū ityanena sthānātmayogarakṣāṃ kṛtvā sugandhādiliptabhūbhāge caturastrādimaṇḍalamadhye pañcatathāgatāḥ pañcayoginyaḥ pūjanīyāḥ |
XXn693u_008:5: tatra madhye viśvavarṇapakārapariṇataviśvāṣṭadalavikasitakamalavaraṭakopari raktarephapariṇata sūryyamaṇḍalasthanīlahūkāraniṣpanno dvibhuja ekamukho bhū sparśamudrādharo vajraparyyaṅkī dvātriṃśallakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanālaṅkṛtaśarīro daśabalavaiśāradyādiguṇagaṇaikanilayaḥ sauśīryyamāṃsāsthirahitaḥ pratibhāsamātradarpaṇapratibimbasamo na satyaṃ na mṛṣā atimaitryātmyakatvāt kṛṣṇavarṇaḥ kṛṣṇavajracihnaḥ suviśuddhadharmmadhātuvijñānaskandhasvabhāvaḥ śiratuṇḍamuṇḍitakāṣāyāvaguṇṭhitavigrahaḥ vajrasattvāṅkitaśirāḥ vajrasattvasvabhāvaḥ śiratunḍamuṇḍitakaḥ,
XXn693u_008:14: iti vikalpāderaspṛśyatvāt vajrakulī- vajrakulaśca lokaiḥ na spṛśyate - dveṣavajraśca śiśiramadhyāhnakaṭuśruti ākāśaśabdacavargo akṣobhyaviśuddho amī bāhyādhyātmikavyavastheyamiti kāyacatuṣṭayavyavasthā cātrāpi pūrvvavat |
XXn693u_008:16: vajrasattvastu hūkārajanmā śuklo dvibhūja ekavakto vajravajraghaṇṭādharo manaḥsvabhāvaḥ kāṣāyarasaśarīraḥ śaradṛtuviśuddho yaralavādyātmakaḥ arddharātrataḥ prabhātakālaparyyanto dharmmadhātuparanāmā |
XXn693u_008:17: ataḥ pūrvvadale candramaṇḍalopari omkārajaḥ śuklavarṇavairocanaḥ śuklacakra(vajra)
XXn693u_008:18: cihnaḥ bodhyaṅgīmudrādharaḥ rūpaskandhasvabhāvaḥ mohasvarūpo viṭaviśuddhaḥ tathāgatakulī ādarśatvena pratiṣṭhitaḥ hemantaṛtuviśuddhaḥ madhurarasaśarīraḥ kavargavyāpīprabhātasandhyātmakāyasvabhāvaḥ |
XXn693u_008:20: dakṣiṇadale sūryyamaṇḍalopari trākārajaḥ pītavarṇo ratnasambhavo ratnacihnavaradamudrādharo vedanāsvabhāvapiśunaśarīraḥ raktātmako ratnakulī samatājñānavān vasantaṛturūpalavaṇaśarīraḥ ṭavargavyāpī tṛtīyacaturthapraharātmakaḥ |
XXn693u_008:21: om āḥ ratnadhṛk hū asya jāpamantraḥ |
XXn693u_008:23: mitābhaḥ padmacihnaḥ samādhimudrādharaḥ saṃjñāskandhasvabhāvo rāgaśarīraḥ śukrātmakaḥ padmakulī pratyavekṣaṇājñāna lakṣaṇo grīṣmaṛturūpa āmlarasa[śa]rīraḥ tavargātmā pradoṣavān |
XXn693u_008:26: moghasiddhiḥ viśvavajracihnābhayamudrādharaḥ saṃskāraskandhasvabhāvo varṣāṛturūpaḥ]piśitāpaḥ tiktarasātmakaḥ pavargaviśuddhaḥ arddharātrasvabhāvaḥ
XXn693u_008:27: asya ca mantraḥ om āḥ prajñādhṛk hū iti |
XXn693u_008:28: ete vajraparyyaṅkinaḥ dvibhujai[ka]vaktāḥ soṣṇīṣaśiratuṇḍamuṇḍita kāpā[yā]vaguṇṭhita -dvātriṃśallakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanālaṅkṛta-daśavalavaiśāradyādiguṇagaṇaikanilayāḥ sauśīryyamāṃsāsthirahitā darpaṇapratibimbopamā na satyāsatyādisaṅkalpanāpagamavimalapratibhāsamātrakasambhogavigrahāḥ kāyatritayaikarasatāsvābhāvikakāyamupādāya asaṃskṛtatathātmakarmmakāyakalpitavijñānakāyāvyabhinnā rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāraskandhātmakā vairocanaratnasambhavāmitābhāmoghasiddhayo vijñānamātratā iti pratipādanāya akṣobhyena mudyante iti |
XXn693u_008:29: akṣobhyāṅkitaśirasi vijñānasya naiḥ svābhāvyasya śūnyatākaruṇayostādātmaka[tvaṃ]ca pratipādayituṃ akṣobhyo'
XXn693u_008:31: etena hetuphalātmakaṃ bhavanirvvāṇaikarasatāmātraṃ jagaditi pratipāditaṃ bhavati |
XXn693u_008:34: sā hi buddhasya dharmmasya saṅghasyāpi hi deśanā ||
XXn693u_008:39: āgneyakoṇadale candramaṇḍalopari śuklalokārajā śuklavarṇā locanā cakracihnā pṛthvidhātusvarūpā tathāgatakulodbhavā moharaktā |
XXn693u_008:40: asyā bījaṃ om āḥ lo hū svāhā iti |
XXn693u_008:41: nairṛtyāṃ candramaṇḍalopari kṛṣṇamākārabījasambhūtā māmakī kṛṣṇavarṇā kṛṣṇavajracihnā abdhātusvabhāvā vajrkulā dveṣaraktā |
XXn693u_008:42: asyā bījaṃ om āḥ mā hū svāhā iti |
XXn693u_008:43: vāyavyāṃ candramaṇḍalopari pākārabījasaṃbhūtā pāṇḍaravāsinaī raktā raktavarṇā padmacihnatejodhātusvarūpā padmakulā rāgaraktā |
XXn693u_008:44: asyā bījaṃ om āḥ pā hū svāheti |
XXn693u_008:45: aiśānyāṃ candramaṇḍalopari kanakaśyāmatākārapariṇatā tāriṇī śyāmavarṇā śyāmanīlotpalacihnā vāyudhātusvarūpā karmmakulā īrṣāraktā |
XXn693u_008:46: asyā bījaṃ om āḥ tā hū svāhā |
XXn693u_008:47: etāḥ catasraḥ ṣoḍaśābdikā asādhāraṇarūpayauvanaśālinyo yathāśobhasaṃsthitā pūrvvavat kāyacatuṣṭayātmikā manohlādinyaḥ sakalajinaguṇādhārabhūtāḥ pañcatathāgatasvarūpāḥ |
XXn693u_008:49: iyameva bhagavatī tathatā śūnyatā prajñāpāramitā bhūtakoṭinairātmyeti vyapadiśyate |
XXn693u_008:51: prayatnaḥ kiṃ ca saṃkṣipya bodhayeyaṃ śiśūn iti ||
XXn693u_009:10: ataeva hi sārvvajñaṃ buddhasya na vihanyate ||
XXn693u_009:15: caryyāṃ na vicaret yastu nāsau sambodhibhājanaḥ |
XXn693u_009:18: mahī śayyā diśo vāso bhikṣābhaktaṃ ca bhojanam ||
XXn693_010:4: dharmmāḥ svapnopamāḥ khyātā viṣpaṣṭārthaṃ tat kathyate ||
XXn693_010:6: māyā yathā pratiṣṭhānaṃ satāṃ kimiha sammatam ||
XXn693_010:14: svapnāt svapnaṃ yadeva syāt ciccitrālīkatā tadā |
XXn693_010:17: nāmni na yujyate nāma apratiṣṭhā tvanāmani |
XXn693_011:11: tau ca tasmāt na bhinnau ca tayostu tat svabhāvataḥ ||
XXn693_011:12: tādātmyaṃ nijaṃ siddhaṃ syāt bhedaścit saṅgahānaye |
XXn693_011:16: vijñāne'pi prasaṅgaḥ syāt tāsāṃ atrāpi hānitaḥ |
XXn693_012:5: sadā jātā niruddhe tu janmacchedo paśorvacaḥ ||
XXn693_012:8: pṛṣṭhe yadīṣyate sattvaṃ sattvaṃ vastu tadā na hi |
XXn693_012:11: nirvikalpaṃ bhavedādau jñānaṃ tad grāhakaṃ tataḥ ||
XXn693_012:17: tāyināṃ tad varaṃ tattvaṃ kṛtrimāt kṛtrimaṃ yathā ||
XXn693_012:18: dhyānamasti na cetyevaṃ na brūmo aṅgacāriṇām |
XXn693_012:22: apratiṣṭhāṃ vidhāyai tat yadalābhi śubhaṃ mayā |
XXn693_013:1: yā yā sphūrttirasau śuddhā buddhā cet avikāratā |
XXn693_013:3: rūpe na vidyate rūpaṃ na vā cakṣuṣi vidyate |
XXn693_013:5: manthāne mathanīye vā na vā puruṣahastayoḥ |
XXn693_013:8: kiṃ mohaḥ svasutān pūrvvaṃ sūte vā sa prajāyate ||
XXn693_013:9: sūta eva na pūrvvaṃ cet atastasya na vastutā ||
XXn693_013:16: bhāvābhāvāvato na sto yuganaddhaṃ tu bhāsate ||
XXn693_013:23: caryyāṃ kuryyāt na vā kuryyāt caryyācārī sa ucyate ||
XXn693_014:12: sukhābhāve na bodhiḥ syāt matā yā sukharūpiṇī |
XXn693_014:15: avastukamato brūmo na sukhamato nāsti ca ||
XXn693_014:32: yathā yathā bhavet sphūrttiḥ sā tathā śūnyatātmikā |
XXn693_014:36: śuddhaṃ śuddhyā jinānāṃ parita iha sadā viśvamābhāti yasya jātaṃ nādau na ruddhaṃ svaparavigaṇanākalpakoṭiprahīnam |
XXn693_015:4: prajñā bhavaḥ samaścāsau trikāyaṃ tu triyānakam |
XXn693_015:7: prajñaiva bhedato bhāti muktiḥ saiva jinātmikā ||3 ||
XXn693_015:8: acintyaṃ cintitaṃ caiva advayaṃ dvayameva ca |
XXn693_015:11: śāntaṃ śuddhaṃ nirābhāsaṃ vittiḥ prajñeti kīrttitā ||5 ||
XXn693_015:18: na satyaṃ na mṛṣākāraṃ ātmānaṃ madhyayoginaḥ ||8 ||
XXn693_015:19: svādhiṣṭhānapadaṃ jñātuṃ ye śaktāḥ tattvato nahi |
XXn693_015:23: vāsanaiva viśuddhā cet sarvvatraiva tu sā tathā ||10 ||
XXn693_015:28: bāhyaṃ vastu manogrāhyaṃ bhrāntaṃ na bhāsate yataḥ |
XXn693_015:32: śūnyatā sarvvavastūnāṃ kasya nāma na sammatā |
XXn693_015:36: tathatāyā tathā śuddhā avidyā yāti vidyatām ||16 ||
XXn693_015:37: yasya cintā bhaved dhyānaṃ tasyācintyaṃ bhavet na kim |
XXn693_015:39: cakramasau bhaved yogī mahāmudrā sa eva hi |
XXn693_016:7: na nedaṃ śāśvataṃ viśvaṃ na cocchedi samīhitam |
XXn693_016:15: na kleśā bodhito bhinnā na bodhau kleśasambhavaḥ |
XXn693_016:17: īryyā ca kāyikaṃ karmma vācikaṃ dharmmadeśanā |
XXn693_016:25: sarvvākārāḥ sukhaṃ tattvaṃ saṅkalpoparateḥ sa te |
XXn693_016:26: śūnyatā na sukhaṃ tattvaṃ na cintyaṃ na sukhaṃ sukham ||13 ||
XXn693_016:28: adṛṣṭe yujyate tasya vṛttaṃ paścāt yathā tathā ||14 ||
XXn693_016:29: na dvayaṃ nādvayaṃ yasya na bodhiḥ sadvilakṣaṇā |
XXn693_017:1: buddhaṃ buddhaṃ jagat śuddhaṃ dvandvabodhe na bandhanāḥ |
XXn693_017:12: hā kiṃ brūmaḥ kathaṃ brūmo brūmo vā kka nu te janāḥ |
XXn693_019:2: na syāt yadi mṛtaiva syāt śūnyatā kāminī matā ||1 ||
XXn693_019:3: śūnyatātivarā kāntā murttyā nirupamā tu yā |
XXn693_019:4: pṛthak yadi kadācit syāt baddhaḥ syāt kāntanāyakaḥ ||2 ||
XXn693_020:5: bodhirasau bhaved bhāvaḥ saṅgaṃ tyaktā svabhāvataḥ |
XXn693_020:7: kiṃ tattvaṃ vastuno rūpaṃ rūpaṃ cārūpakaṃ yataḥ |
XXn693_020:12: ajasraṃ jāyate tattvaṃ yasmāt tat padavedinām ||6 ||
XXn693_020:15: etat tattvāvarodhena yena tena yathā tathā |
XXn693_021:13: apara āha,hanta lakṣaṇasādhitamevedaṃ vacaḥ kiṃ ca asiddham |
XXn693_021:19: tathā avikalpapraveśādhāraṇyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvvavikalpanimittāni ākāśagatikāni amanasikārataḥ parivarjjayati |
XXn693_021:26: svarūpeṇa na cittaṃ nāpi cetamam | tathā -
XXn693_021:27: bhāvyante hi jagat sarvvaṃ manasā ya(smā)
XXn693_021:36: evannāma tā guptā rājadārā yat sūryyamapi na paśyantīti |
XXn693_021:38: kiṃ nāma rājadārāṇāṃ yat sūryadarśanaṃ prasajyaṃ tanniṣiddham |
XXn693_021:40: pi naño manasikaraṇaṃ yad grāhyagrāhakādi prasaktaṃ tanniṣiddham |
XXn693_021:42: yadā kaścidevaṃ vadati śāśvatocchedalakṣaṇo mana[si]kāraḥ sammato bhagavatā |
XXn693_021:49: ete sarvvavikalpasamati krāmatā darśitā bhavati amanasikāraśabdeneti |
XXn693_021:55: yadi cātra naño vyutpattiratra kriyate akārapradhāno'
XXn693_021:58: kka nirddiṣṭaṃ bhagavatā anutpādakārako akāra iti ?
XXn693_021:59: tad yathā uktaṃ ca hevajre mantrapaṭale,
XXn693_021:61: asyārthaḥ,sarvvadharmmāṇāṃ ādyanupannatvāt akāro mukhaṃ pradhānaṃ ityakārastvanutpannalakṣaṇaḥ yo'graḥ |
XXn693_021:66: tra nairātmyāvījaṃ tathā ca hevajre ālerādi nerādi nairātmyeti |
XXn693_021:79: astīti vadato brūmo nāsti sarvvaṃ vicārataḥ |
XXn693_021:91: ye dharmmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat |
XXn693_021:92: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ ||
